Name: Big Fish
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. *Special ingredient #1 : Earl Grey syrup made with 10g Dilmah Earl Grey tea, 500ml boiling water and 300g caster sugar.
Review: Earl Grey tea, dry sherry and sherry vinegar combine with the aged rum to produce a very interesting drink. Earl Grey flavours linger on the finish.
History: Created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Vitaly Alekseyev at The Duchess, Amsterdam
Nutrition: One serving of Big Fish contains 150 calories
Garnish: Maraschino cherry on cocktail stick & 2 bay leaves
